description: How to generate value for column from functional dependency.

use_mode.description: Select a value from the FD keys (generate-from-keys) or get a value using a key formed from the values of other columns (choose-from-values)

dataset_columns_as_fd_key.description: In case of use_mode=choose-from-values. Here the columns are listed from the values of which the key will be formed to obtain the value from the FD.

value_position.description: In case of use_mode=choose-from-values. Number of column from data columns of FD to return as a generated value.

choose_method.description: In case of use_mode=generate-from-keys. The way we get exact value from set of values (keys of FD).
